name: Timescape (TnbDev)
description:
The Game needs a few seconds to load so for the first about 10 seconds the game might be a blackscreen but after that it works fine

In this game you are the pilot of a time machine that is stuck in spacetime, you have to escape but you have not much time left. Can you escape it?

Collect Clocks, they give you a little bit of extra time, Keys can give u a big bosst of time but only if used in a keyhole so they can open a backdoor in spacetime that grants you bonus time.

This game is designed as an endless scroller and an entry for Jame Gam with the topic out of time and the extra objective key.

I hope you enjoy the game.

Credits: I used the Thalea Font from the Unity Asset Store and the Cinemachine Package from Unity, everything else was made by me in the duration of the Jam.
